  • Method Details

    • bookSlot

      boolean bookSlot(int gymId, int startTime, String email)
      Book a slot at a specific gym for a given time using the user's email.
      Parameters:
      gymId - - The ID of the gym
      startTime - - The time slot to be booked
      email - - The email of the user making the booking
      Returns:
      True if the booking is successful, false otherwise

    • getAllBookingsByUserID

      List<FlipFitBookings> getAllBookingsByUserID(int userId)
      Retrieve a list of all bookings made by a specific user.
      Parameters:
      userId - - The ID of the user
      Returns:
      List of bookings made by the user

    • cancelBooking

      boolean cancelBooking(int bookingId)
      Cancel a specific booking by its ID.
      Parameters:
      bookingId - - The ID of the booking to be canceled
      Returns:
      True if the booking is successfully canceled, false otherwise

    • getBooking

      FlipFitBookings getBooking(int bookingId)

    • validateUser

      boolean validateUser(String email, String password)
      Validate a user's credentials (username and password).
      Parameters:
      email - - The username of the user
      password - - The password of the user
      Returns:
      True if the user's credentials are valid, false otherwise

    • createUser

      boolean createUser(FlipFitUser user)
      Create a new user.
      Parameters:
      user - - The user object to be created
      Returns:
      True if the user is created suceessfully

    • updateUserDetails

      boolean updateUserDetails(FlipFitUser user)
      Updates the details of an existing user in the system.
      Parameters:
      user - - The FlipFitUser object containing the updated details of the user.
      Returns:
      True if the user details were successfully updated ,false otherwise

    • getUserIdByEmail

      int getUserIdByEmail(String email)
      Retrieves the user ID associated with the given email address.
      Parameters:
      email - The email address of the user whose ID is to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      Returns the user ID associated with the provided email address.

    • viewAllGymsWithSlots

      List<FlipFitGym> viewAllGymsWithSlots()
      Retrieves a list of all gyms that have available slots.
      Returns:
      A list of FlipFitGym objects representing gyms with available slots.

    • viewAllGymsByArea

      List<FlipFitGym> viewAllGymsByArea(String area)
      Retrieves a list of gyms located in the specified area.
      Parameters:
      area - The area used to filter the gyms.
      Returns:
      A list of FlipFitGym objects representing gyms located in the specified area. If no gyms are found in the given area, an empty list is returned.
